title: The CEO Who Knows Where You’ve Been
text:
In his younger days, Jeff Glueck assumed he would go into politics, but the fast-paced nature of the private sector proved too enticing for the Foursquare CEO.

A White House fellow under President Bill Clinton, Mr. Glueck worked on climate and clean energy policy before he stumbled into founding an internet startup in 1999 with another White House fellow, Michelle Peluso. Travelocity acquired their online travel company, Site59.com, three years later for $43 million, giving him a taste of how satisfying rapid results in the...
description: In his younger days, Jeff Glueck assumed he would go into politics, but the fast-paced nature of the private sector proved too enticing for the Foursquare CEO.
